actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for travel and transportation expenses on the return of an employee who was a past resident of certain areas outside the continental United States from a post of duty in the continental United States.

summary.text: Authorizes a Federal agency to pay from its appropriations travel and transportation expenses for the return of an employee who was a past resident of specified areas outside the continental United States from a post of duty in the continental United States. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 5722 (a) (2))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for travel and transportation expenses on the return of an employee who was a past resident of certain areas outside the continental United States from a post of duty in the continental United States.
